item.title: Deploy hugo blog on github pages
item.description: Deploy hugo blog on github pages What is Hugo? Hugo is a fast and modern static site generator written in Go, and designed to make website creation fun again. In short, Hugo is a static website generation tool which transforms markdown into beautiful web pages. One can get started with hundreds of available themes or even create a new one. Let’s jump right in. First of all, we would need to install Hugo.
